title: Business Analyst - Tech
content:
OVERVIEW:We're expanding our Delivery function and looking for two experienced BA's that have been immersed in the world of Technology. 
As a BA specialising across Tech, you will facilitate communication between stakeholders in either Customer Platform Engineering or Product Platform Engineering, translating business needs into actionable plans. 
WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING:

Support the team to help them to ensure that each problem or requirement being solved is ready for work and is broken down to be independent, valuable, estimable and testable.
Ensuring that your team has context and understanding of Business and Customer needs to produce valuable solutions for the end user. 
Articulating technical realities to stakeholders of all levels (Technical and non technically focused). 
Producing and identifying the requirements of Stakeholders through conversations, document analysis, requirement workshops, business process descriptions, analysis, user cases, scenarios and workflow analysis.
Map, analyse and document current and future complex business requirements using standard tooling and agreed standards, for Teams and Stakeholders to understand proposed solutions. 
With a data led approach and assistance from the Insights team, you will be articulating the value from solutions.
Apply Design Thinking with the team to critically analyse and refine the problems and requirements we are solving - ensuring the solutions the team build are user focused and have considered different scenarios that can occur when building software.
Work closely with the Product Owner, UX and Agile, Scrum Masters and agile teams to deliver outcomes to business-as-usual activities as well as larger business initiatives across either Customer or Product Platform

WHAT YOU'LL NEED:Essential Criteria:

Must have experience as a BA in either Tech Platform or Tech Systems. 
Ability to work on a volume of tickets.
Significant experience working in Agile environments.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment
You are someone who is not afraid to challenge and question points of view, regardless of stakeholder, to unearth requirements and help form the right solutions.
Able to work flexibly and to tight deadlines.

This is a hybrid role and would require the successful candidate to attend at least 3 days a week in GSHQ, Solihull, UK.
CLOSING DATE: Wednesday 29th November 2023 
BELONGING AT GYMSHARK.
Our mission is to be a place where everyone belongs. We‚Äôre an equal opportunities employer, and for us that means we always strive to be as inclusive as possible in all aspects of employment, right from your application. We‚Äôre committed to finding reasonable adjustments* for candidates with specific needs or have a disability during our recruitment process, and all applicants will be considered fairly and equally. We do not tolerate discrimination of any kind. *If you‚Äôd like to request a reasonable adjustment please email talent@gymshark.com. 
ABOUT US.
We‚Äôre here to unite the conditioning community. We believe that putting the sweat in today, prepares us for tomorrow. So, we give people the tools they need to reach further, go faster, be stronger. We celebrate those who show up ‚Äì for themselves ‚Äì to be their physical or mental best, whatever that means for them. It‚Äôs what we want for our community, and our team. A team that‚Äôs growing rapidly around the world. A collective of talented individuals working together to invent Gymshark‚Äôs future. Our plans are ambitious, and we‚Äôre looking for people who want to join us for the ride ‚Äì our growth will be your growth.
THE PERKS.
üôå Competitive ‚ÄòWin Together, Lose Together‚Äô Bonusü©∫ Choice of Private Medical Insurance or Healthcare Cash Plan, paid for by us!üèñ 25 days holidays + your birthday and all the Bank Holidays which can be substituted and taken whenever you want.üíª A truly Flexible Working Cultureüë• A collaborative, creative and inspiring working environmentüí∞ Employer pension contributions up to 7%ü§© Life Assurance at four times your basic salaryü¶à 50% Gymshark DiscountüéÅ Gymshark Gift Card for each year of serviceü•á Financial, Physical and Mental Wellbeing Supportüìö Great Training and Learning Resourcesüñ• Choice of hardware and access to the best softwareü§í Paid time off when you‚Äôre physically and mentally unwellüß∏ Very Generous Family Leave package ‚Äì we support you extending your familyüçé Refuel - Healthy fresh food at GSHQüèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Lifting Club (LC) Gym Membershipüëâ Free monthly massagesüíà Beauty and Barber facilitiesüöò Free on-site parking
 
#LI-MA

demographic_questions.description:
We highly encourage candidates to complete this survey, which will help us understand who is applying to join us. All the information we receive is anonymous and aggregated into an overall report so we can monitor our recruitment processes to make them more inclusive and take positive action to ensure Gymshark is diverse and representative.

For each of the questions, you have the option to select “Prefer not to say” if you don’t want to provide the information.

questions.label: How would you describe your gender identity?
Is your gender identity the same as the sex you were assigned at birth?

answer_options.label: Asian/Asian British - Prefer not to say
Black/African/Caribbean/Black British - Prefer not to say
Mixed/multiple ethnic groups - White & Black Caribbean
Mixed/multiple ethnic groups - White & Black African
Mixed/multiple ethnic groups - Prefer not to say
Other ethnic group - Prefer not to say

questions.label: Do you consider yourself to have a disability or impairment?
Which of the following best describes your sexual orientation?
Tell us: Why Gymshark? Why this job? And why you?
Tell me about your experience working with Engineering teams. (no more than 250 words).
Have you worked in an agile environment?
What are your salary expectations (per annum) for this role?
What is your current notice period?
Are you a current Gymshark employee?

questions.description: Legally, we have to verify your Right to Work in the UK before you can start work with us. We're asking for this information now so we know what type of right to work check we need to do later on in the process. Your answer to this question won't affect the outcome of your application, unless you need visa sponsorship and are applying for a role that we can't sponsor.
questions.label: Please confirm your UK Right to Work status.

values.label: I'm a UK or Irish National.
I'm an EU, EEA, or Swiss National with status under the EU Settlement Scheme.
I've got another type of visa, which gives me permanent right to work in the UK.
I've got another type of visa, which gives me temporary right to work in the UK.
I have visa sponsorship from another company, which gives me the right to work in the UK but, would need visa sponsorship to work for Gymshark.
I don't have the right to work in the UK and would need visa sponsorship to work for Gymshark.

questions.description:
‚úÖ Disability Confident Committed 

We’re proud to be a Disability Confident Committed employer and want to encourage anyone with a disability to apply for a role at Gymshark. We offer an interview to candidates with disabilities or long-term conditions who meet the minimum criteria for the role. 

Please let us know below if would you like to apply through the Disability Confident scheme.

values.label: Yes, I want to apply through the Disability Confident scheme

questions.description:
üôå Reasonable Adjustments

We’re committed to finding reasonable adjustments for candidates with specific needs or have a disability during our recruitment process, and all applicants will be considered fairly and equally. We do not tolerate discrimination of any kind. 

If you’d like to request a reasonable adjustment please email talent@gymshark.com.

üîèPrivacy Statement 

We understand that keeping your data safe is really important - it's important to us too!

When you apply for a role with us your personal data in your application will be collected by Gymshark Ltd. and/or Gymshark US Inc. (collectively, “Gymshark”).

This data will be processed subject to our Job Applicant Privacy Notice. 

Please confirm your acknowledgment of this.
